Définit la transparence individuelle pour les fenêtres des applications en cours d'exécution, et pour la fenêtre supérieure ajoute de la transparence dans le style Aero Glass ou Fluent Acrylic.


Nos autres programmes dans le Microsoft Store:

TaskbarGadget  -  Un ensemble de mini-programmes sur la barre des tâches offrant la surveillance des paramètres de l'ordinateur HDD & SSD, CPU, RAM, GPU, Réseau, Batterie, Radio, Volume, Météo et offrant un accès facile à de nombreuses fonctions de Windows.

TaskbarGadgetLT  -  Version allégée de TaskbarGadget - indicateurs noir et blanc, pas d'égaliseur dans la radio, etc.

TaskbarEffect  -  L’application crée une barre des tâches dans des couleurs toujours irisées avec une transparence en constante évolution, avec superposition d’effets Aero Glass ou Fluent Acrylic et avec une ombre se transformant en douceur en rétroéclairage.

TaskbarEffectLT  -  Version allégée de TaskbarEffect - seule la couleur de la barre des tâches change constamment.

TaskbarEffect+  -  Version étendue de TaskbarEffect - mise en évidence des couleurs des zones fonctionnelles de la barre des tâches, mettant en évidence les applications épinglées et actives avec la possibilité de les positionner au centre ou à droite. Toutes les zones fonctionnelles prennent en charge des couleurs constamment irisées avec une transparence changeante de manière dynamique.

TaskbarRadio  -  Radio avec égaliseur sur la barre des tâches - vingt mille stations de radio du monde entier pour tous les goûts et pour toutes les humeurs.

TaskbarStyle  -  Le programme rend la barre des tâches transparente, translucide, avec un dégradé monochrome ou tricolore, avec l'effet Aero Glass ou Fluent Acrylic, avec une ombre ou un contre-jour, et définit également la couleur des boutons des applications ancrées et en cours d'exécution. Plus de cinquante thèmes de barre des tâches prédéfinis.

TaskbarToDock  -  L'application crée à partir de la barre des tâches standard un dock similaire au dock MacOS.

WindowTransparent  -  Définit la transparence individuelle dans l'ordre Z pour les fenêtres de différentes applications.

LiveWallpaperSubstance - L'application crée des fonds d'écran animés qui changent de forme et de couleurs irisées.

LiveWallpaperSubstance+ - Version étendue de LiveWallpaperSubstance: ajoute la possibilité d'affiner les paramètres de visualisation.

Attention : si des tweakers sont utilisés ou ont été utilisés sous Windows, les applications peuvent ne pas fonctionner correctement, utilisez donc la version d'essai avant d'acheter les programmes.

Nom De L'application: Measure Distance on Screen - Pixel Ruler
Description:
On screen ruler measuring the distance of objects on the screen in Pixels, Inches, True-size Millimeter.

CORE FEATURES OF PIXEL RULER

• Pixel, Millimeter, Inch: Switching by click the Ruler button or key P (pixel), M (millimeter), I (inch).
• The target point continuously goes accompany with the mouse cursor for positioning and auto-sizing thoroughly.
• Using left click (or space bar) to mark and measure your selection partially.
• Switch between the horizontal and vertical views by: click the Rotate symbol, or using key R.
• Lengthen or shorten the ruler by: click [-] / [+]  button to make ruler longer or shorter; or using key S (Shrink) / E (Extend).
• Click the navigation button or press key B (block) to lock or unlock moves to prevent accidental clicks.
• Relocate the zero point: click the Circle symbol to to left, right, center.
• To keep on screen Ruler floating over the desktop by selecting "Always on Top".
• Move ruler by every single pixel: CTRL / ALT + keyboard arrow.
• Options to measure distance between 2 or 3 points.
• Options to make ruler more useful: hide guide, reading strip mode.

PERSONALIZATION

• Scrolling the mouse wheel up and down to decrease / increase transparency respectively to observe the objects under the ruler easily. 
• Switch light or dark theme for clearly observation by clicking the Painting Tray symbol. 

• The sense of proportion is not precise and also take much time. This leads the creators to have a digital ruler measuring any objects on screen. Pixel Ruler shows its role: align precisely, refine process, reduce redundant.
• Not an on-shelf ruler, Pixel Ruler is a tool which aiming at developers, programmers and digital designers to measure the elements for front-end development, web design, graphic design or any task you may need.

The Python Package Installer is a game-changer for programmers, particularly addressing one of their key challenges: the efficient management and installation of Python packages. This tool, with its user-friendly graphical interface, significantly streamlines this process. It enables users to swiftly search for, select, and install the Python packages they need with just a few simple clicks.

A standout feature of this tool is the ability to choose between different versions of a package. Users have the flexibility to install either the latest version or a specific one of their choosing. Additionally, every installation command executed is displayed in a text box, allowing for meticulous monitoring of the installation process.

Another important aspect of this tool is its console panel, which displays the installation output. This feature enables users to observe the installation process in real time. Moreover, there is a progress bar that indicates the current status of the installation, adding to the tool's convenience.

Before initiating the installation, the tool checks for an internet connection to ensure access to PyPI (Python Package Index). Furthermore, if users enter import lines related to the desired packages, the application automatically identifies and installs the corresponding packages, eliminating the need to know the exact package names.

The latest enhancements to this tool include the ability to view all installed packages, automatically check for the latest released versions of each package, and update to the latest or a specific version. Users can also access the most recent documentation for each package, including usage guides, installation instructions, and a variety of examples. Additionally, the tool offers the functionality to uninstall packages that are no longer needed.

To effectively use this application, it is required that your system has Python and pip pre-installed, and you should have access to the internet. It is also recommended to run the application as an administrator for optimal functionality. This tool is essential for Python developers, helping them to save time and focus more on coding rather than the intricacies of installing and updating packages.

Nom De L'application: Input Logger - Log Keyboard and Mouse
Description:
Input Logger - Log Keyboard and Mouse is a powerful and intuitive application designed to track and record all your keyboard and mouse activity on your Windows device. Whether you're a professional user looking to keep a record of your work, or a curious individual who wants to analyze their daily computer habits, Input Logger is the ideal tool for you.

With Input Logger, you can easily monitor and log every key press and mouse click event on your computer, and analyze the data to gain insights into your usage patterns. The app is easy to use and runs silently in the background, making it an ideal solution for both personal and professional use.

Features:
- Log all keyboard and mouse activity: Input Logger tracks and records all keystrokes and mouse clicks, giving you a detailed log of your computer usage.
- Secure and private: Input Logger is designed with security in mind and does not transmit any data outside of your computer. All data is stored locally on your device, and you have complete control over who can access it.
- Easy to use: Input Logger is designed with simplicity in mind, and the user-friendly interface makes it easy to navigate and use the app without any prior experience.

Input Logger - Log Keyboard and Mouse is the perfect solution for anyone looking to keep a record of their computer activity, gain insights into their usage patterns, and enhance their productivity. With its user-friendly interface, customizable settings, and comprehensive logs, Input Logger is a must-have tool for anyone who spends time on their computer. 

So why wait? Download Input Logger today and start tracking your keyboard and mouse activity like a pro!

Human Japanese Intermediate will take your Japanese language skills to the next level. If you liked the first HJ, you'll love Intermediate. (And if you're new to Human Japanese, welcome aboard! Find a full list of content by chapter at www.humanjapanese.com/intermediate.)

Like its predecessor, Human Japanese Intermediate is built on the idea that the best way to learn and truly comprehend Japanese is to have it explained by someone who speaks your language. Core concepts are explained in a friendly, down-to-earth tone, with frequent comparisons to similar aspects of English. With humor and warmth, it demystifies and illuminates the real nuts-and-bolts of the language--not just vocabulary and canned phrases like many other products.

Explanations come alive with deeply interwoven interactive example sentences--more than 2600 in total--so that you can immediately see and hear exactly what you're learning.

Stay on track with INGREDIENTS™ example sentence breakdowns. Next to every sentence is an icon that provides an instantaneous, simultaneous lookup of every word in the sentence, even conjugated forms! That means you'll never lose your flow in the middle of an interesting discussion just because you've momentarily forgotten the meaning of a word.

Solve the chicken-and-egg aspect of kanji with our integrated approach that carefully explains how everything works and then dynamically changes the "spellings" of words to either kana, kanji, or kanji with furigana to match what you've learned at that point.

Stay sharp with five different kinds of quizzes that track your history to help you focus on trouble spots.

We care deeply about helping you to grow in your understanding of Japanese. Whether you've worked through the original Human Japanese app or have come from a different background, it will be our pleasure and privilege to be your guide on the next stage of your journey. Hajimemashou!

DNG to PNG converter supports optimization options:

DNG to JPG/JPEG converter supports optimization options:
• Quality: adjust lossy compression quality, to make jpg output image file size smaller than PNG file size, better for storage and SEO purpose.

DNG to GIF converter supports optimization options:
• Adjust number of colors in color palette.
• Support 2 dithering methods.

DNG to ICO converter supports optimization options:

DNG to WEBP converter supports optimization options:

• Lossy WebP compression:
•• Lossy compression quality: lower quality but smaller file size or vise versa.

## MULTIPLE DNG CONVERSION AT ONCE & SINGLE FILE PROCESS

The product requires the following:
Monitors supporting DDC/CI commands.

* WS Monitor Controls
This utility gives you easy access to your display configuration controls directly from Windows. Adjust the monitor's brightness, contrast and color temperature without having to reach for small and cumbersome physical monitor buttons. Lower the brightness in the evening to prevent eye strain.

* GUI Menu (WIN+F3)
The menu of WS Monitor Controls is accessible through the Windows System Tray (the area left to the clock) and gives quick access to display controls. The shortcut for the menu is WIN+F3. If the icon is hidden behind the 'Show hidden icons'-arrow, you can simply drag it to a visible part of the systray.

Available controls:
-Menu
  -File
    -Save...  Saves current monitor settings to file
	-Browse Storage  Open storage folder in Windows Explorer
	-Quit
	-Followed by a list of previously saved monitor settings which can be loaded
  -Help
    -Help...  Show this readme
	-About
-Monitor selection dropdown
-Reset Settings button (factory defaults)
-Brightness percentage slider
-Contrast percentage slider
-Volume percentage slider (adjust the volume of the monitor's build-in speakers, if available.
-Input Source selection (DP 1, DP 2, HDMI 1, HDMI 2, DVI 1, DVI 2, VGA)
-Color Temperature selection (custom, 4000K, 5000K, 6500K, 7500K, 8200K, 9300K, 10000K and 11500K)
  -Custom:  3 additional color sliders appear to set the red, green and blue intensity individually.

You can use the usual keyboard keys:
-TAB/SHIFT+TAB to switch controls
-Cursor keys to select values
-PageUp/PageDown with sliders to increase/decrease value with 10%

When using the sliders you can optionally hold CTRL to change the value for all attached monitors.

WSMonitor.exe command line parameters:
/load name  Load monitor settings from file
/save name  Save current monitor settings to file

Nom De L'application: Nero Burning ROM - All-in-One Disc Burn Solution
Description:
Avec la technologie de gravure éprouvée de Nero Burning ROM, établissez de nouvelles normes.

Vous souhaitez copier et importer des données et de la musique pour les graver sur votre type de disque préféré ? Vous voulez créer des disques en toute fiabilité et sécurité ? Aucun problème ! La dernière version de Nero Burning ROM s'appuie sur SecurDisc 4.0 et bien plus encore pour vous offrir les meilleurs résultats.


Extraction

Vous avez le choix : vous cherchez à accéder à vos CD audio et vos morceaux de musique individuels sur votre PC, votre smartphone ou votre lecteur MP3 ? Convertissez-les en fichiers au format voulu en un rien de temps ! Nero Burning ROM vous propose une offre complète, des MP3 et MP3 PRO aux formats AAC, FLAC et APE, titres de chansons et informations sur les albums inclus. Grâce à la technologie Gracenote® intégrée, les pochettes d'album originales sont intégrées au fichier audio. Vous pouvez ainsi parcourir facilement vos listes de lecture et écouter votre musique à votre guise.



Copie

Passez des moments média encore plus agréables : vous aimeriez partager vos films et pouvoir écouter vos tubes préférés à tout moment, aussi bien dans la voiture que le salon ? Copiez* des CD, des DVD et des Blu-ray Discs™, en bénéficiant d'une qualité et d'un son aussi bons que l'original. Vous pouvez également copier des CD audio en toute simplicité, notamment le texte du CD, les détails et la couverture de l'album d'origine.

* Réservé au contenu non protégé contre la copie



Gravure

Mettez le feu au multimédia : Que ce soit pour immortaliser vos souvenirs préférés sur CD, DVD ou Blu-ray Discs™, pour graver tous types de disques, vous devez avoir accès à la meilleure solution spécialisée de sa catégorie. Créez des images ISO ou gravez vos structures de disque vidéo et vos images disque sur de nouveaux supports de données. Grâce aux filtres et autres réglages, ainsi qu'à l'amélioration automatique du son vous permettant de l'adapter à votre goût, les CD audio gravés proposent une plus grande richesse sonore. De plus, grâce à la technologie Gracenote®, vous disposez maintenant aussi des pochettes d'album originales sur MP3 CD et MP3 DVD pour votre nouvel autoradio. 



Protection

Protégez les choses qui vous sont chères : bénéficiez d'un niveau de sécurité professionnel. Avec la technologie SecurDisc 4.0, vos fichiers sont entre de bonnes mains. Grâce au cryptage 256 bits, à la signature numérique et la protection par mot de passe conformes aux normes du secteur, vous seul pouvez accéder à vos archives de données gravées. Nero étant à la pointe de la durabilité et de la lisibilité, même les disques rayés seront toujours lisibles grâce à la redondance des données réglable.

New: Compress is completely free. The Microsoft Store version is identical to the free version and there are no features left out of the free version. Purchasing the store version directly funds the development of Compress and shows your support. 
You can download the free version from our website: compress.ohzi.io

Compress is the easiest way to get your video files shrunk, and that is due to how the UI helps you get the job done. 

There are no menus, options, toolbars, output fields, or any other elements that would normally comprise an interface. You'll only find two buttons and a small message that instructs you on how to compress your file. A simple drag and drop is enough to start the compression process.

Regarding the two buttons, they influence the end result. The default one is Faster Encode, which facilitate a quicker compression and reduce the most size. The other option, Better Quality, allows you to compress a video without sacrificing much quality. After a video is compressed, a new video file is created in the previously selected folder.

Compress is just that type of app that you'll probably stick with for many years, as its simple interface and efficient process will win you over.

Forces each photo and video in Apple's iCloud folder to download and become local to your computer. Apple's iCloud App no longer downloads your photos and videos, instead, they’re on-demand links to your cloud versions, which causes issues with backups, viewing your photos and videos, using Microsoft Photos App, and going off-line. 

Please note, for this application to work, you need to have Apple's iCloud App installed and configured to download your photos. This app is also not affiliated with Apple in any way.

Designed to be super-simple and get on with the job, Cloud Photos Downloader will force the download of all files in your iCloud Photos album, this includes videos, raw, jpeg, jpg, png, screenshots, etc.

Downloading files can take time. Downloading 50,000 files, for example, from iCloud will take a long time, even on the fastest broadband speed, so it's best to run over-night when first run. To help speed this up there's an "Unlimited Bandwidth Use" toggle which, when on, pushes the Apple iCloud Client to use as much bandwidth as possible; when off, it'll allow the iCloud client to download at its own default speed.

Nero DuplicateManager Photo vous aide à procéder à un nettoyage rapide et précis dans vos archives d'images, en distinguant les images exactes, dupliquées et similaires.



Finies les photos inutiles

- Plus d'espace de stockage : grâce à DuplicateManager Photo, finies les pertes d'espace de stockage coûteuses

- Plus de temps : ne perdez plus un temps précieux à faire des recherches à la main

- Une meilleure visibilité globale grâce à la technologie intelligente de recherche de doublons (images exactes, dupliquées ou similaires)



Plus d'espace de stockage, une meilleure vue d'ensemble

Vous archivez vos photos depuis des années sur votre PC et vos appareils connectés ? Vous vous retrouvez maintenant avec un grand nombre d'images en double ou similaires sur votre PC, occupant un espace de stockage précieux ? Rassurez-vous, vous n'êtes pas un cas isolé. 

Nero DuplicateManager Photo résout vos problèmes rapidement, en toute sécurité.

1. Lancer la recherche : récupérez une partie de cet espace disque si précieux avec DuplicateManager Photo.

2. Confirmer la présélection : la technologie Smart Duplicate Finder vous fait des recommandations.

3. Doublons supprimés : les doublons sont supprimés en toute sécurité pour une meilleure visibilité générale, avec la possibilité de les restaurer si vous le souhaitez.



Une solution fiable à vos problèmes

Le problème :

Tous ceux qui utilisent leur PC pour archiver leur collection de photos depuis différentes sources (smartphones, appareils photo numériques, clés USB, stockage en ligne...) rencontrent ce problème. Nombreux sont ceux qui ont été confrontés à des situations de ce type :

• Multiplication des images en double, issues de plusieurs appareils

• Photos en double après partage avec la famille et les amis

• Copies d'images en double créées accidentellement

• Images quasiment identiques en raison du traitement d'image (filtres, correction des couleurs, etc.)

• Images quasiment identiques en raison du redimensionnement

• Images quasiment identiques en raison de la prise de vue en rafale

• Images quasiment identiques en raison des séquences d'images HDR importées depuis votre smartphone

• Images quasiment identiques en raison de nombreux motifs similaires

• Images identiques stockées dans différents formats d'image



La solution :

Pour sortir de cette situation, vous devez commencer par identifier les doublons, puis décider des images que vous souhaitez conserver et de celles qui doivent être supprimées en toute sécurité. Ce processus est souvent très chronophage. De plus, il n'est pas toujours évident de décider de ce qu'il faut conserver ou non. Nero DuplicateManager Photo résout ces deux problèmes : il vous aide à faire le ménage dans vos archives d'images, en repérant rapidement et avec précision les doublons exacts et les images similaires.



Rien de plus simple



Il vous suffit de sélectionner un ou plusieurs des dossiers à nettoyer et de lancer la reconnaissance d'image. Le mode nettoyage d'image repère les doublons exacts et vous indique les fichiers à conserver et ceux que vous pouvez supprimer en toute sécurité ; quant au mode de reconnaissance d'image similaire, il classe automatiquement vos images similaires en plusieurs catégories : « Lieux », « Série », « Motif », « Redimensionnement », « Formats », entre autres. Vous pouvez ainsi aisément trouver les images similaires, les comparer et décider lesquelles conserver ou non.



Finis les doublons inutiles

Ne perdez plus un temps précieux à batailler avec des archives d'images et un disque dur pleins à craquer. Utilisez Nero DuplicateManager Photo dès maintenant et débarrassez-vous enfin de cette tâche autrefois difficile.

Nom De L'application: Paranoia File Encryption & Text Encryption PRO
Description:
The application comprises two modules:
➤ File Encryptor: This module allows you to securely encrypt your private and confidential files or entire folders. You can accomplish the encryption/decryption process simply by dragging the selected file(s) or folder(s) to the application window. The application works like an archiver, creating a new .enc file after encryption. 

➤ Text Encryptor: Protect your messages, notes, cryptocurrency keys (seeds, mnemonics), and other text-based information from unauthorized access. You can choose to use the internal database, simply copy/paste to and from your favorite applications, or drag a text file onto the application window. The app does not function as a "Vault application". Instead, a password is set for the current encryption/decryption session, not to enter the app itself. You may have an unlimited number of passwords for any purpose—different files, tasks, people, etc.

⬥ Algorithms: All information is encrypted using robust encryption algorithms: Threefish 1024bit, SHACAL-2 512bit, Paranoia C4 2048bit (cascade of Threefish–Serpent–AES–SHACAL2), AES (Rijndael) 256bit, RC6 256bit, Serpent 256bit, Blowfish 448bit, Twofish 256bit ciphers.

⬥ Steganography: The Text Encryptor includes a steganographic feature (hiding a text within a JPEG image). The steganographic F5 algorithm is used in conjunction with the chosen symmetric cipher algorithm to produce the final steganogram (JPEG image).

⬥ Compatibility: This application is compatible with mobile applications like Secret Space Encryptor for Android and Paranoia File / Text Encryption for iOS.

⬥ The application also offers you a key to activate PRO features in its versions designed for other desktop operating systems (Linux, macOS, Solaris, ...).

Zen Brush 3 is a drawing app focused on the strong yet beautiful feel of the East Asian ink brush which can be used to perform calligraphy, ink painting and more.

The drawing system that brings to life a feeling of silky fluent and delicate painting now allows an even wider range of expression thanks to the addition of "water" and "color". Providing a new simple and intuitive user interface, this app is designed to be optimal for performing Zen art.

Simply start the app and you are immediately ready to draw. Anyone, anywhere, can create superb Zen art with this app’s uniquely rich expressiveness. You can also easily share and edit your calligraphy and images with other apps using the Export functionality. Skillfully use the rich background style templates to create and share atmospheric artwork.


- The drawing system simulates a 3D model of an East Asian ink brush to enable varied and natural styles of brush handling.
- The adjustable amount of water makes it possible to create expressions ranging from powerful edge effects to "nijimi" (bleeding) and "bokashi" (blurring) where colors mix.
- You can also enjoy creating colored-ink paintings as well as watercolor paintings by making use of 30 selected traditional Japanese colors.
- The layer functionality allows more flexible editing.
- Import photos to add text to them or use them as background images for tracing.
- Create fascinating artwork with a rich assortment of background style templates.
- Traditional Japanese paper templates provide an authentic feel.


Features:
- 5 main tools (ink brush, color brush, water brush, eraser, blotting paper).
- 10 levels of thickness.
- 5 levels of water (not applicable to blotting paper).
- 10 levels of ink tone (not applicable to water brush and blotting paper).
- Color palette with 30 colors.
- 89 background style templates.
- Drying functionality (fast dry, instant dry, adjustable natural dry).
- Layers functionality (import image / color adjustment / move / rotate / scale / reverse left and right / white transparency / gradation effect).
- Guide display (character guides / partition guides / grid guides).
- Movable toolbar (top / bottom / left / right).
- Canvas zoom (zoom in and out with pinch gestures).
- Undo / redo (5 levels).
- Export functionality (formats: JPEG, PNG, transparent PNG (no background)).
- Support for stylus and graphic tablets compatible with Windows Ink.
- Drawing tool selection (finger and stylus / stylus only).
- Adjustable brush pressure sensitivity (5 levels, with supported stylus only).
- Adjustable tilt sensitivity (5 levels, with supported stylus only).
- Gesture functionality (pinch zoom and drag, zoom toggle with 2-finger tap).
- 3D brush display (enable / disable).
- Pointer display (enable / disable).
- 5 levels of canvas resolution with a maximum of 3072 x 4096 pixels (the higher resolutions do not work on devices with lower specs).

Look no further, you have found the best Financial Calculator app available. 

Highlights:
- Displays current N, I/YR, PV, PMT and FV values right above buttons 
- Print or Save PDF Amortization Schedules 
- Easily enter your Uneven Cashflows in a spreadsheet-like worksheet
- Video Tutorials in Help section 
- Draws Cashflow Diagrams for simple TVM or complex Uneven Cashflows 
- Saves Recent calculations so you can easily reload them 
- Easy Mode allows everyone to get the financial answers you need!

Finally a Financial Calculator for everyone! Whether you are a seasoned investor or you just have questions about paying off your credit card, refinancing your home, or planning your 401(k) contributions, the 10bii Financial Calculator has the answers to YOUR financial questions!

The 10bii Financial Calculator is a versatile and powerful financial calculator which features more than 105 different functions for financial analysis, business, statistics, and general mathematics. Modeled after the extremely popular HP 10bII Financial Calculator, the 10bii Financial Calculator app combines precise mathematics, intuitive display, and ease-of-use in one compact package. It allows you to easily calculate loan payments, interest rates, amortization, time value of money, investment value, and more using a combination of powerful and intuitive equation-writing functionality and helpful worksheets. The 10bii Financial Calculator's keypad has been specially designed to be easy to use and easy to see. 

By expanding on HP's traditional presentation, the 10bii Financial Calculator allows quick and intuitive building and visualization of TVM (Time Value of Money) calculations and Uneven Cash Flows, lets you see the stored values of all of your memory registers in one easy view, graphs your statistical series, and lets you type in whole equations for easy review and one-touch evaluation.

With the 10bii Financial Calculator, you can:

Easily enter and see diagrams for Cash Flows, including rapid calculation of Net Present Value and Internal Rate of Return. A dedicated interface makes adding, editing, deleting, and reordering uneven cash flows a breeze.

Enter and analyze statistical data points, and see graphs based upon the values you enter. Includes standard calculations such as standard deviation, mean, and linear regression forecasting.

Never has using a financial calculator been so easy or intuitive. The 10bii Financial Calculator is powerful enough for the professional but accessible enough for everyone. It is an ideal tool for teaching the power of compounding interest, analyzing potential deals or business ventures, or just doing math problems, and sharing the results of your work with others.

Special thanks to our interns, Brian LaBarbera and Greg Rucker for helping us to create this great app for you!

Meshman 3D Viewer is a great app to view and convert 3D model files: STL, OBJ, 3DS, DAE, DXF, DWG, FBX, PLY, OFF.

Main Features:

- Open & Export files from formats:
  * STL (Stereolithography, supports ASCII & Binary)
  * PLY (Polygon file format, supports ASCII & Binary)
  * OBJ (Wavefront format)
  * 3DS (3D Studio format)
  * DAE (COLLADA file format)
  * OFF (Object file format)
  * DXF (AutoCAD format, supports ASCII & Binary)

- Open (only) files from:
  * DWG (AutoCAD format)
  * FBX (Autodesk Filmbox format)

- Load from a ZIP file a model file.
- Batch export files from one format to another.
- Can load large models, as big as 1 GB.
- Measure distance between points within your model.
- Graphic operations for Rotating, panning, zooming.
- View your model in Orthogonal or Perspective mode.
- Obtain info on the model: triangle count, bounding box, area, volume.
- Set up rendering options: faces, edges, points, transparency.
- Render using a clipping plane (useful for viewing interiors).
- Open multiple files, view in fullscreen.

Notezilla is a useful note manager that you can use to quickly write notes, to-do lists, and reminders on colorful sticky notes to be stuck to your Windows desktop, as well as websites, documents, programs, or any other window. Once installed, Notezilla will add a new icon to the task bar. You can create a new note with just one click on the icon, so you won't lose any time.

If your desktop is full of too many notes, you can organize them into folders and find them by opening your note explorer, from which you can view and organize them. You can tag Notezilla notes by context, theme, or project, and password protect them to keep your private information secure.

The app also includes options to change the appearance of your notes, like color, transparency, skin, and text formatting. From the program options, you can leave the notes always visible, attach documents to them, or even activate an alarm. With Notezilla it's possible to synchronize notes with your PDA or smartphone through Microsoft Outlook. It's the perfect tool to help you never forget a meeting or important event.

ico -> pdf, bmp, eps, gif, jpg, impair, png, ps, psd, tiff

png -> pdf, bmp, eps, gif, ico, jpg, impair, ps, psd, tiff

Remove duplicate or similar photos and videos from your computer and recover disk space. 

Using AI techniques normally reserved for the cloud, Duplicate & Similar Photo Cleaner views your photos as you do, making it easier to find duplicates, across multiple file formats and sizes. It also finds similar photos that may have been edited, or are part of a photo sequence.

To make it easy, auto-select, selects the most obvious duplicates for you, using a rules based engine, allowing you to review and edit, or just send the duplicates to the recycle bin, backup folder, or delete them permanently.
	
Features:-
	• AI analysis of photos to view them as a human would.
	• Auto-Selection using a rules based decision engine.
	• Safe backup and recycle, or remove duplicates permanently.
	• Tested to millions of files, terabytes of duplicates.
	• Exclusive to Windows 10 using Microsoft's latest technologies.
	
How do you benefit from Duplicate & Similar Photo Cleaner?
	• Save space by removing all the copies you have in different places and files.
	• Remove duplicate videos as well as photos and images.
	• Faster searching, quicker backups, uploads, more mobile and cloud  storage.
	• Speed up your computer with less files to deal with and lower fragmentation

What kind of photos and videos do we clean?
	• Supports Photos: AVIF, HEIC, DNG JPG, JPEG, PNG, BMP, TIFF, GIF
	• Supports Videos: HEVC, WMV, MP4, AVI, MPG, MOV, QT, M4V

What devices can we scan?
	• Supports folders, drives, usb, network mapped drives, and UNC shares.

Nom De L'application: WebP to JPG - WebP to PNG
Description:
Batch convert WEBP to PNG/PNG8, JPG/JPEG, GIF, BMP, ICO, WEBP, PBM, PCX, WBMP.

💡 Convert multiple files at once, there's no limit to how many files.
🔒 All processing is performed locally on your computer where your files remain safe and private.

Optimize output file size and image quality; Quick preview WEBP images; Buy once and keep forever;

## CORE FEATURES

Convert WEBP to JPG and more output formats:
• PNG, PNG8.
• JPG, JPEG.
• GIF.
• BMP.
• ICO (support multiple size icons).
• WEBP.
• PBM.
• PCX.
• WBMP.

## OPTIMIZE OUTPUT IMAGES

Not only a WEBP to JPG converter, but also optimize size and quality output images.

WEBP to PNG converter supports optimization options:
• Support lossless compression options to make your output image size smaller, keep highest quality.
• Keep the image's background transparent or change them to opaque (choose a color to fill).
• Interlaced: support interlaced, non-interlaced PNG.

WEBP to PNG8 converter is to convert WEBP to PNG8 and supports optimization options:
• Support lossless compression options to make your output image size smaller, keep highest quality.
• Keep the image's background transparent or change them to opaque (choose a color to fill).
• Interlaced: support interlaced, non-interlaced PNG.
• Adjust number of colors in color palette.
• Support 2 dithering methods.

WEBP to JPEG converter supports optimization options:
• Quality: adjust lossy compression quality, to make jpg output image file size smaller than PNG file size, better for storage and SEO purpose.
• Background color: choose a color to fill the transparency area.
• Progressive: choose the way to encode and display image - JPEG progressive vs JPEG baseline.

WEBP to GIF converter supports optimization options:
• Adjust number of colors in color palette.
• Support 2 dithering methods.
• Keep the image's background transparent or change them to opaque (choose a color to fill).

WEBP to BMP converter supports:
• Keep the image's background transparent or change them to opaque (choose a color to fill).

WEBP to ICO converter supports optimization options:
• Multiple sizes icon: choose multiple image sizes to embed in 1 ICO.
• ICO size fit options: Contain, Cover, Fill.
• Keep the image's background transparent or change them to opaque (choose a color to fill).
• Support crop image to easy control output image area for icon.

WEBP to WEBP converter supports optimization options:
• Number of methods: to use to compress image, software will choose the best of result, the more methods, the more chance to make output image size smaller.
• Keep the image's background transparent or change them to opaque (choose a color to fill).
• Lossless WebP compression:
•• Lossless compression supports near lossless compression method (experimental).
•• Choose image source type (default, photo, picture, graph), and the software will choose the best way to process your image.
• Lossy WebP compression:
•• Lossy compression quality: lower quality but smaller file size or vise versa.

WEBP to PCX converter is to convert WEBP to PCX and supports:
• Background color: choose a color to fill the transparency area.

## COMMON IMAGE OPTIMIZATION OPTIONS

• Rotate image, Vertical and Horizontal Flip image.
• Adjust brightness/contrast.
• Support option to remove potentially privacy-compromising metadata (EXIF, IPTC, XMP) from image and to keep the output file size smaller.
• Simple options "Make Default" for easier usage.
• Resize output images (keep aspect ratio and ignore aspect ratio).

## MULTIPLE WEBP CONVERSION AT ONCE & SINGLE FILE PROCESS

• Save time with multiple files processed at once.
• Or focusing on a single image.

## MORE
• Batch convert between JPG and PNG.
• Keep PC awake while converting images.
• Shutdown  PC after converting.

PhotoHero est un éditeur de photos puissant, facile à utiliser et léger pour Windows 10 et 11.
Nécessitant environ 50 Mo d'espace disque, PhotoHero est l'un des éditeurs d'images les plus légers disponibles et est optimisé pour des performances maximales sous Windows.
PhotoHero fournit une tonne de fonctionnalités pour les utilisateurs occasionnels et professionnels :
- prise en charge de nombreux formats d'image, notamment PSD/PDD (Adobe Photoshop), PSP (PaintShop Pro), XCF (GIMP), fichiers d'appareil photo RAW, AVIF, HEIC/HEIF (*), SVG, TGA, DDS, JPEG, GIF, PNG, TIFF, JPEG XL; prise en charge des images animées (GIF, PNG, WebP)
- outils standard : sélection, dessin, ajout de texte, tampon de clonage, etc.
- ajustements : recadrer, faire pivoter, redimensionner, redresser, luminosité, contraste, teinte, saturation, ombres, balance des blancs, etc.
- amélioration automatique
- filtres : netteté, flou, distorsion, rendu, filtres artistiques et plus encore. Vous pouvez également créer votre propre filtre personnalisé.
- calques
- support pour le plugin 8bf d'Adobe 
- capture d'écran; capture d'écran animée; importer depuis le scanneur 
- enregistrement macro
- édition / conversion / réparation par lots
- éditeur de métadonnées
- comparer deux images
- charger et enregistrer des préréglages
- importer et exporter des palettes ou des tables de recherche de couleurs dans plusieurs formats
- plusieurs onglets pour les images
- aspect personnalisable
- peut facilement être défini comme éditeur d'image par défaut pour des formats spécifiques (ou tous) via les paramètres Windows, sans perdre les aperçus d'image par défaut de l'Explorateur Windows.

* Veuillez noter:
- Les images HEIC / HEIF ne sont prises en charge que si les codecs nécessaires sont installés sur votre système. Le moyen le plus simple de les obtenir est d'installer les addons HEIF et HEVC de Microsoft à partir du Microsoft Store.
- AVIF n'est pris en charge que sur les systèmes 64 bits
- PhotoHero peut fonctionner en mode S, mais certaines bibliothèques tierces ne fonctionneront pas. Cela peut empêcher certains formats d'image de se charger correctement
- PhotoHero prend en charge plusieurs langues, mais certaines d'entre elles sont encore en cours de développement. Par conséquent, certaines parties de l'application peuvent encore être en anglais ou contenir des traductions incorrectes.

Nom De L'application: Translate Any Language - Traducteur pour 108 langues
Description:
Cette application peut traduire plusieurs langues, un traducteur qui traduit 108 langues et prend en charge la détection automatique de la langue. C'est un outil d'efficacité essentiel pour votre bureau, vos études et vos voyages à l'étranger.

Achat unique pour une utilisation et des mises à jour à long terme.
Pas de publicité, pas de 2 paiements et abonnements, et pas de limitations de fonctionnalités.

Installez sur votre appareil et traduisez rapidement les langues de différents pays.
Les langues de traduction couramment utilisées, qui peuvent être marquées comme favorites, seront triées en haut.
Trier par tag favori, nom.
La valeur par défaut est de détecter automatiquement la langue ; bien sûr, vous pouvez également sélectionner la langue source à traduire, puis sélectionner la langue cible pour la traduction.

La langue de traduction peut être modifiée.
Prend en charge la recherche de langue de traduction.
Prise en charge de la recherche dans l'historique des traductions.
Prise en charge de la date de filtrage pour afficher l'historique des traductions.
Le texte peut être collé dans la zone de texte de traduction.
Les résultats de la traduction peuvent être copiés.
Le contenu de la zone de texte peut être effacé.
Simple à utiliser, prend en charge l'enregistrement local de l'historique des traductions.
Une fois la traduction réussie, elle est automatiquement enregistrée dans la base de données locale, afin que les enregistrements puissent être recherchés en fonction de la date lors de la prochaine visualisation.
L'historique de traduction peut être supprimé intégralement et de manière sélective.

Do you have recipes trapped in Living Cookbook recipe software?

This program will read a Living Cookbook 2015, 2013, 2011, 2008, or 2005 backup file (.lcb) and export your recipes to:
• Living Cookbook (.fdx) export files which can be imported into most other recipe software
• MasterCook (.mz2) export files (use this format if you're moving to MasterCook!)
• Microsoft Word (.docx) documents with customizable styles and a table of contents
• Plain text (.txt) files

This program is designed to help you if you have Living Cookbook backup files, but you can no longer run the program because of license key issues. Radium Technologies, the publisher of Living Cookbook, has gone out of business and can no longer validate license keys. For many users, Living Cookbook stopped working when they attempted to reinstall the program and/or update hardware on their PC. Radium Technologies also stopped responding to support tickets to reset license keys to enable those reinstallations. The result: users are locked out of their recipes. The recipes are trapped in Living Cookbook’s database with no way to run the program.

Send us a support email if any of these situations apply:
• You are not running Windows 10 or 11 or have access to another PC running them. We’ll discuss your options.
• You don’t have an .lcb file. If the Living Cookbook data files are still on your system, we might be able to help.

FileBot is the ultimate tool for organizing and renaming Movies, TV Shows, Anime or Music. It's smart, highly customizable, and just works.

If you're using HTPC software like Plex, Kodi or Emby then FileBot is a must-have utility!

FileBot will match your files against TheMovieDB or TheTVDB and then rename (or move / copy / symlink / hardlink) them exactly the way you want it. Anything is possible!

If you need help extracting archives en masse or checking SFV / MD5 / SHA1 / SHA256 files then FileBot will get that done too.


Getting Started:

Organize your media files:
1. Drag media files onto "Original Files"
2. Click "Fetch Data" and select a database
3. Hit "Rename"!


Still having trouble? Visit us at www.filebot.net and have a look at the FAQ and Forums. You can report bugs or request help via Discord or by making a New Topic in the Forums.

Nom De L'application: AVIF to JPG - AVIF to PNG
Description:
Convert AVIF to PNG, JPG, PNG8, JPEG, GIF, BMP, ICO, WEBP, PBM, PCX, WBMP.
💡 Convert multiple files at once, there's no limit to how many files.

Optimize output file size and image quality; Quick preview AVIF images; Buy once and keep forever;

## CORE FEATURES

Convert AVIF to JPG and more output formats:
• PNG, PNG8.
• JPG, JPEG.
• GIF.
• BMP.
• ICO (support multiple size icons).
• WEBP.
• PBM.
• PCX.
• WBMP.

## OPTIMIZE OUTPUT IMAGES

Not only a AVIF to JPEG converter, but also optimize size and quality output images.

AVIF to PNG converter is used to convert AVIF to PNG and supports optimization options:
• Support lossless compression options to make your output image size smaller, keep highest quality.
• Keep the image's background transparent or change them to opaque (choose a color to fill).
• Interlaced: support interlaced, non-interlaced PNG.

AVIF to PNG8 converter is to convert AVIF to PNG8 and supports optimization options:
• Support lossless compression options to make your output image size smaller, keep highest quality.
• Keep the image's background transparent or change them to opaque (choose a color to fill).
• Interlaced: support interlaced, non-interlaced PNG.
• Adjust number of colors in color palette.
• Support 2 dithering methods.

AVIF to JPG converter is made to convert AVIF to JPEG and supports optimization options:
• Quality: adjust lossy compression quality, to make jpg output image file size smaller than PNG file size, better for storage and SEO purpose.
• Background color: choose a color to fill the transparency area.
• Progressive: choose the way to encode and display image - JPEG progressive vs JPEG baseline.

AVIF to GIF converter supports optimization options:
• Adjust number of colors in color palette.
• Support 2 dithering methods.
• Keep the image's background transparent or change them to opaque (choose a color to fill).

AVIF to BMP converter supports:
• Keep the image's background transparent or change them to opaque (choose a color to fill).

AVIF to ICO converter supports optimization options:
• Multiple sizes icon: choose multiple image sizes to embed in 1 ICO.
• ICO size fit options: Contain, Cover, Fill.
• Keep the image's background transparent or change them to opaque (choose a color to fill).
• Support crop image to easy control output image area for icon.

AVIF to WEBP converter supports optimization options:
• Number of methods: to use to compress image, software will choose the best of result, the more methods, the more chance to make output image size smaller, the more time consumed.
• Keep the image's background transparent or change them to opaque (choose a color to fill).
• Lossless WebP compression:
•• Lossless compression supports near lossless compression method (experimental).
•• Choose image source type (default, photo, picture, graph), and the software will choose the best way to process your image.
• Lossy WebP compression:
•• Lossy compression quality: lower quality but smaller file size or vise versa.

AVIF to PCX converter is to convert AVIF to PCX and supports:
• Background color: choose a color to fill the transparency area.

## COMMON IMAGE OPTIMIZATION OPTIONS

• Support option to remove potentially privacy-compromising metadata (EXIF, IPTC, XMP) from image and to keep the output file size smaller.
• Simple options "Make Default" for easier usage.
• Resize output images (keep aspect ratio and ignore aspect ratio).

## MULTIPLE AVIF CONVERSION AT ONCE & SINGLE FILE PROCESS

• Save time with multiple files processed at once.
• Or focusing on a single image.
• Batch convert between JPG and PNG.

Nom De L'application: LocoGPT LLM- AI Chatbot on Your Device
Description:
**Note: You need to download an large language model (LLM)  to use this app.**
**Note: You will need a PC that has CPU supports AVX2 to use this app.**

LocoGPT LLM is a fun and innovative app that lets you chat offline with an AI agent that uses a large language model (LLM) of your choice. You can have a casual conversation, ask a question, or request some imaginative and innovative content such as poems, stories, code, essays, songs, celebrity parodies, and more. The AI agent can understand and communicate fluently in your language of choice, using its own words and knowledge.

## Features

- Offline chat session that uses a large language model (LLM) of your choice
- Choose from three different chat modes and configurations: Balanced, Creative, and Precise, or customize to suit your mood and preference
- Ask the LLM to generate imaginative and innovative content such as poems, stories, code, essays, songs, celebrity parodies, and more using its own words and knowledge
- Request the LLM to help you with writing, rewriting, improving, or optimizing your content
- Customize inference and model parameters to fine-tune the output and performance of the app for example Temperature, TopP, TopK, RepeatPenalty, MaxTokens, RepeatLastTokensCount, Prompt Template, Anti Prompts
- Choose your models folder from your computer
- Able to customize prompt template and anti-prompts
- Customize the app’s appearance with Mica, Mica Alt, Acrylic, or Dynamic Shader Animation backgrounds

## Models

You can browse and download pre-selected LLMs or bring your own .gguf model file. The app supports gguf file format and can run LLM models well even without GPU or not enough GPU memory. The app also supports Nvidia Cuda 11 and 12 GPU and AVX2 CPU.

To download more models, you can go to https://huggingface.co and find .gguf to suit your needs. For example, you can check out these models:

- [OpenBuddy]: https://huggingface.co/OpenBuddy - A multi-language model that can chat in English, Spanish, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, Dutch, Polish, Russian, Turkish, Arabic, Hindi, Chinese, Japanese, and Korean.
- [TheBloke]: https://huggingface.co/TheBloke - A popular model that can generate various types of content such as poems, stories, code, essays, songs, celebrity parodies, and more.

The Crosshair Designer is a desktop application for Windows 10/11 that allows you to design highly customized crosshairs (or, "reticles") and use them while playing full-screen PC games. The Crosshair Designer works alongside a free companion widget for the "XBOX Game Bar" available on the Microsoft Store (called "Crosshair Designer Overlay"). If you haven't used the XBOX Game Bar, don't worry, it's free, super simple to use, and is a part of Windows 10/11 that is purpose-built just for this sort of overlay.

The Crosshair Designer provides a high level of customizability, so that you can setup crosshairs that work well for you.

For example, you may want to:
- Quickly create a super simple and tiny dot-sight
- Meticulously adjust your crosshairs to replicate a specific crosshair you loved from some game
- Design a really big crosshair that makes it look like you're looking through a big scope.

This software allows you to do all of those things.

Another cool feature of the Crosshair Designer is that it allows you to have a "dynamic" crosshair - that is, a crosshair that changes/reacts to your mouse inputs. You can define what you want to happen to the crosshair as you use your mouse.

For example, maybe you want:
- Your crosshair to get a bit wider or change color when you hold down the left mouse button
- Your crosshair to change to have very fine/thin "legs", with a high-contrast center dot when you are "aiming down sights".

This software allows you to customize that. However, if you want a "static" crosshair (i.e., it doesn't change based upon mouse input), you can absolutely set it up that way, too.

Why not use ______ instead?

You have other options:
[list][*]In-game crosshair customization (if your game allows it)
[*]Other third-party software
[*]Some clever approach of your own (maybe an NVIDIA overlay or stamp)[/list]

Why not just use one of those options?
- Many games don't allow much, if any, customization of crosshairs
- Coming up with your own approach (like using an NVIDIA utility) may just not work with your game
- Other software may restrict what you can create. For example, you may be limited to rather small crosshairs, or limited in the amount of complexity, details, fine-tuning, and adjustments you can make to your crosshairs.
- Other software may not allow you as much ability to create "dynamic" crosshairs, especially if you want to have different crosshairs for different "states" (e.g., a different crosshair for "not shooting", "shooting", "aiming down sights", and "shooting while aiming down sights").

About the XBOX Game Bar and companion widget

One important thing to note though is that you need to install the companion widget that operates in the XBOX Game Bar. The widget is totally free and is custom-designed to work with this desktop application. Also, in my opinion, the "game bar" is the primary way of displaying overlays on modern Windows operating systems (10/11), especially for overlays meant to work with full-screen PC games.

There are other ways of displaying overlays, but I think some of them are "risky" - for example, they may involve "hooking" into DirectX in order to render a crosshair on top of a full-screen game. My concern with those other approaches is that there may be a risk of it triggering anti-cheat software, because the anti-cheat software would see some external application "messing around" too closely with your game.

Instead, I think the game bar overlay approach will tend to "just work" and be "safer", as it is a part of Windows 10/11 that is meant just for this sort of use case. And, from an anti-cheat software perspective, it's no different from displaying a little music or PC performance widget in the overlay. Further, this software isn't "talking to" your games or interacting with them in any way. It's simply rendering your custom crosshairs and, if you want it to, reacting to your mouse inputs (independently of your games).

Ajoutez vos fichiers: Cartes Pro permet d'ouvrir vos fichiers KML, KMZ, GPX et GeoJSON et vous permet aussi d'enregistrer votre trajet au format GPX.

Téléchargez toute la donnée d'un pays et vous serez ensuite capable de rechercher des adresses, d'afficher des points d'intérêt et de calculer des itinéraires avec guidage vocale même sans connexion Internet.

Créer de superbes cartes: Cartes Pro vous permet de changer le style de votre carte en choisissant parmi plus de 20 styles de cartes dont Nokia, ESRI, MapBox, Stamen, OpenStreetMap (OSM) et Bing Maps. Créez des cartes personnalisées et ajoutant des superpositions comme le Google Traffic, les chemins de randonnées ou les restrictions camion.

Géolocalisation: Votre position est automatiquement détectée par Cartes Pro, par votre adresse IP (PC de salon), votre GPS (tablette) ou par un Bluetooth GPS. Cartes Pro est la seule appliation du Windows Store compatible avec les GPS Bluetooth externes!

Calcul d'itinéraire: Cartes Pro vous aide à trouver votre chemin avec son puissant moteur de calcul d'itinéraire. Calculer votre itinéraire à partir d'une adresse, de votre géolocalisation ou depuis des coordonnées et obtenez des instructions de voyages détaillées (avec guidage vocal) et re-calcul automatique si vous ratez un virage. Points d'intérêt (POI): Choisissez parmi plus de 80 catégories de Points d'intérêt comme les restaurants, cinémas, bars, stations essence, etc.

Si vous voulez remplacer Microsoft Street And Trips abandonné par Microsoft, Cartes Pro est la meilleure solution de substitution.

Cartes Pro est utilisé par des milliers d'utilisateurs dans le monde: randonnées en Allemagne, préparation de rally en Suède, visualisation de projets immobiliers en Afrique du Sud, planification de voyage en camping en Grande Bretagne, trekking en Mongolie et périple en mobile-home aux Etats-Unis sont juste quelques exemples d'utilisation de Cartes Pro!

IRCAM Thermal Viewer, is an Infrared Thermal Camera Analysis software, for use in applications such as Temperature Monitoring, Thermal Inspection, Electronics Repair, Scientific Research, Search and Rescue, Electronics R&D and much more. 

Supported Thermal Cameras:
•	InfiRay T2L (Including V2 & A2 Models)
•	InfiRay T2-Search (Including V2 & A2 Models)
•	InfiRay T2S+ (Including V2 & A2 Models)
•	InfiRay T2Pro (Including V2 & A2 Models)
•	InfiRay T3-Search
•	InfiRay T3S
•	InfiRay T3Pro
•	InfiRay P2
•	InfiRay P2Pro
•	InfiRay DV-DL13
•	InfiRay S0 Series
•	InfiRay Tiny1-C
•	HTI HT-301
•	UNI-T UTi260M 
•	TOPDON TC001
•	TOPDON TC002
•	Victor 328B

The software includes many advanced features, with more being added continuously. Perfect for any thermal analysis application.

The software was written and developed to be used with the InfiRay series of thermal cameras, but support for any UVC thermal camera can be added, to enable the software to be used with a large selection of thermal cameras from different brands.  

There are many High-End thermal cameras on the market, especially coming from the Chinese market. These cameras offer very impressive specifications, and for an affordable price. Some of these cameras even rival or outperform many of the well-known brand thermal cameras, and for a fraction of the price.

The downside of buying such a camera, is that almost all of these cameras, are lacking some kind of analysis software for PC. The majority of the cameras, are limited by the functionality of a specific manufacturer written Android or IOS app, which heavily limit the usability and functionality of such capable thermal cameras.   

If more advanced features, functionality and a capable PC software is needed, then only well-known brand thermal cameras offer such a solution – but for a price no private person or small business could ever afford - and with limitations on the physical camera specifications, due to restrictions on the European and American market.

This is where IRCAM Thermal Viewer comes in. IRCAM Thermal Viewer is developed by a Danish electronics engineer, with a passion for thermal imaging. This software is the much-needed PC analysis software, which finally unlocks the potential of a vast selection of thermal cameras available on the market. The software features a large selection of advanced features and a community Discord server, where users can ask questions, report issues and suggest new features to future versions of the software.

Thank you for choosing IRCAM Thermal Viewer, Hope to see and hear from you on Discord! https://discord.gg/RAcbW6M9hg

WS Virtual Desktop Tool is our utility that improves upon the Windows 10 Virtual Desktop feature. Its menu is accessible through the Windows System Tray (the area left to the clock) and gives a compact overview of all your open application windows. The shortcut for this menu is WIN+ESC. If the icon is hidden behind the 'Show hidden icons'-arrow, you can simply drag it to any visible part of the system-tray. Its icon displays the index of the currently active virtual desktop.

This utility lets you switch between multiple virtual desktops and move windows instantly with keyboard shortcuts. It also allows you to configure different wallpapers for each virtual desktop. When you switch to another virtual desktop, its associated wallpaper is automatically shown. To configure different wallpapers, just do so through the usual Windows Background settings (ms-settings:personalization-background).

Shortcuts:
WIN + ESC
  > Opens menu 
WIN + 1..20 (or optionally CTRL + SHIFT + 1..20)
  > Switch to virtual desktop 1..20 (the desktop will be created if it does not exists yet)
ALT + WIN + 1..20
  > Move window at mouse pointer to virtual desktop 1..20 (window focus is not needed)
SHIFT + WIN + 1..20
  > Move focused window to virtual desktop 1..20 and switch to it
WIN + INS
  > Show application at mouse pointer on all virtual desktops (pinned app)
WIN + DEL
  > Normal application behavior: show on the active virtual desktop only (unpinned app)
ALT + WIN + INS
  > Show window at mouse pointer on all virtual desktops (pinned window)
ALT + WIN + DEL
  > Normal window behavior: show on the active virtual desktop only (unpinned window)
ALT + INS
  > Always open application at mouse pointer on current virtual desktop (to undo use WIN + DEL)
ALT + TAB (tweak to build-in Windows feature)
  > Shows Windows Application Switcher on the monitor that contains the mouse pointer (when using multiple monitors).

Menu Items:
[Show X always op top]
  Enables top most/not top most for the active window
[Show X on all desktops]
  Pin/unpin active application on all virtual desktops
[Move X to]
  Desktop 1..X
-
  A list of shortcuts in your personal Favorites folder.
  Holding CTRL+SHIFT runs the shortcut elevated (as admin).
  [Show favorite folder contents...]
    Opens the Favorites folder in Windows Explorer so you can review/add/delete shortcuts or sub folders.
    Tip: Browse the Windows start menu at %ProgramData%\Microsoft\Windows\Start Menu\Programs from where you can copy/paste select shortcuts to your Favorites folder.
-
Followed by a list of all open application windows. Hovering over an item will show a live preview. Clicking an item will activate the application.
  Holding CTRL while clicking will activate and move the application to the current virtual desktop.
  Holding SHIFT while clicking will close the application window.

-
[Options]
  [x Wallpaper support for virtual desktops]
    Enables/disables the feature that allows each virtual desktop to have its own wallpaper configuration.
  [x Hide desktop icons on extra virtual desktops]
    Enables/disables hiding of desktop icons on virtual desktops except the first one.
  [x Each virtual desktop has its own desktop shortcuts]
    Enabled/disables unique desktop icons for each virtual desktop.
  [x Show desktop name when switching]
    Enables/disables showing the virtual desktop name after switching.
  [x Create new desktop if it does not exist yet]
    Enables/disables automatic creation of virtual desktop when switching.
  [x Use alternative shortcuts for virtual desktop switching]
    Use CTRL + SHIFT + 1..20 to switch virtual desktops instead of WIN + 1..20
[About/Help...]
[Quit]

Flow CSV Editor is a light-weight tool for viewing, plotting and editing time series data files in CSV format. It's designed to be extremely quick and easy to use. It opens any valid CSV files immediately without any dialogs or complicated commands, and within seconds you'll be viewing, analyzing and editing the data of interest.

Flow was originally written with the signal processing engineer in mind. It is optimized for timed data such as measurement logs and sensor data files, but it's also useful for viewing and editing large machine learning data sets as well as for other applications where numeric data is involved. The data is visualized as line plots, and zooming, scrolling and rearranging the plots is fast and efficient, also on large data sets.

A free version without the editing and saving capabilities, Flow CSV Viewer, is available.

Nom De L'application: Irix Pro HDR Classic - AI Photo Editor
Description:
Irix Pro HDR Classic donne vie à l'édition de photos HDR en offrant des modifications en un clic à un ensemble d'outils d'édition professionnels à grande échelle avec une interface utilisateur (UI) hautement cognitive.

• Remplacement du ciel (SkyXpress) - remplacez le ciel et entrez la météo. Importez des ciels personnalisés et fusionnez, mélangez, intégrez à votre image pour un look naturel avec AI Edge Detect.

• Numéros abrégés (préréglages et filtres) - Plus de 200 préréglages optimisés pour les médias sociaux avec une seule touche pour une édition instantanée. Affichez le préréglage en direct appliqué à votre photo, sélectionnez et cliquez pour terminer la photo.

• AI Auto Enhance - Édition automatique de style professionnel avec une seule touche. Le moteur Irix HDR Voxell AI est formé sur plus de 12 millions d'images et applique des techniques photographiques éprouvées pour améliorer vos photos.

• Correction des couleurs professionnelle - correction des couleurs avec sélection des hautes lumières et des ombres, réglage du contraste, équilibre des couleurs et des blancs, niveau de noir, saturation et luminosité de l'image entière ou d'une zone sélectionnée.

• Superpositions - Importez des superpositions personnalisées et ajoutez des effets tels que la lumière artificielle, les rayons divins, les reflets de l'eau, l'effet de halo, les ondulations, le rétro et les arrière-plans étonnants.

• Ajustements locaux. Apportez des modifications locales avec des masques et des pinceaux. Appliquez les masques Radial, Gradient, Brush, Luminance, Depth. Insérez des superpositions personnalisées dans la zone sélectionnée.

• Texte, émoticônes et filigranes. Stylisez le texte, insérez un copyright, un filigrane ou une légende. Exprimez vos émotions avec les emoji

• LUT - Importation de LUT aux formats .CUBE, .VF, .3DL. Créez vos propres LUT en tant que fichier .CUBE

• Modification de la profondeur - Appliquez des ajustements locaux et globaux à n'importe quelle couche de profondeur ou insérez une superposition.

• Montage à 360 ° et panoramique : montage, visualisation et exportation, idéal pour l'aménagement paysager

• Images 64 bits. Traitez des images 8-64 bits en toute fidélité avec votre GPU (Nvidia, AMD, Intel) en fidélité 64 bits.

• Gammes ICC prises en charge : XDR, HDR, P3, sRVB, Adobe RVB, CMJN, niveaux de gris, PANTONE© et espaces colorimétriques LAB.

• Collaborez en ligne - Partagez des catalogues d'images (IRX) avec des collègues pour prévisualiser votre travail dans n'importe quel navigateur Web. Ou transmettez simplement un catalogue avec toutes les couches modifiables, et l'édition peut reprendre là où vous l'avez laissée.

• Prise en charge de la caméra. Modifiez des photos RAW de Sony, Nikon, Kodak, Canon, Panasonic, Ricoh, Samsung, etc.

• Les moteurs Voxell-G Graphics et Voxell AI étendent l'espace colorimétrique jusqu'aux limites de la perception de l'œil humain et prennent en charge les formats XDR, HDR, HDR10, HDR10+ pour les images 64 bits.

• Irix HDR 'GPU Optimizer' force le CPU et le GPU à travailler en tandem, offrant une édition nette, complète et précise sans perte.

• Créez et vendez des préréglages/LUT pour Adobe Lightroom, Photoshop, Premier Pro, DaVinci Resolve, Final Cut Pro, Pixelmator et OBS.

• Technologies Windows - Conçu pour les processeurs SQ1, SQ2, Intel et AMD utilisant le moteur d'apprentissage automatique et le rendu DirectX. Prise en charge de OneDrive, Auto HDR et des affichages à taux de rafraîchissement élevé.

Caractéristiques principales
- Température de couleur, teinte, luminosité, saturation
- Lumière - exposition, luminosité, contraste, hautes lumières, ombres, blancs, noirs, diffus
- Recadrer, faire pivoter, retourner. Cadres prédéfinis pour FB, Twitter, Instagram, Pinterest
- Guérison et clonage

Capacités étendues
- Édition d'images RAW
- Perspective et affine (redressage), correction trapézoïdale
- Déformation du maillage - douceur et reprise à la main
- Outils d'IA - Netteté, Dehaze, Denoise, Netteté, Flou (Défocalisation), Bokeh. Outils spéciaux pour l'édition de photos de nuit
- Correction optique lentille et chromatique
- Vignette, grain et pixellisation
- Outils de modelage du visage et du corps - retouche de la peau, élimination des imperfections, look photogénique

Fonctions

Pengwin Enterprise is a Windows Subsystem for Linux (WSL) solution compatible with mainstream enterprise Linux distributions such as **Oracle Linux** and **Red Hat Enterprise Linux**. It is designed for enterprise users who need a secure, reliable, and fast Linux environment on their Windows machines.

Pengwin Enterprise can be customized to fit the organization's needs and leverage existing Linux infrastructure and subscriptions. Pengwin Enterprise also comes with a rich set of tools and packages to help you work productively with Linux on Windows.

Whether you are a developer, a system administrator, a data scientist, or a power user, Pengwin Enterprise can meet your needs and enhance your workflow.

Pengwin Enterprise installs itself as a menu entry in Windows Terminal. We crafted the background and the color palette for the best looking and usability in Windows Terminal. Configuring Pengwin Enterprise as your Default Profile in Windows Terminal allows greater integration with the Windows environment. Specifically, right-click a folder in File Explorer and select Open in Terminal. It will open in the chosen directory, making it easier to access all necessary files and tools from within the terminal.

Access your C:\ drive at /mnt/C automatically. Copy and paste from Visual Studio into Emacs. Open Word from zsh. Pipe ifconfig.exe output into a Python script. It is a hybrid world. Pengwin Enterprise bridges the gap between Windows and Linux.

Pengwin Enterprise is designed for custom deployments in consultation with Whitewater Foundry's international team of WSL experts.

This build provided on the Microsoft Store is built from Rocky Linux, for demonstration purposes and personal use only.

Businesses and institutions who wish to license Pengwin Enterprise, use Pengwin Enterprise with Red Hat Enterprise Linux (Red Hat Enterprise Linux subscription required), and obtain a support contract for Pengwin Enterprise should e-mail enterprise@whitewaterfoundry.com or visit https://www.whitewaterfoundry.com/pengwin-enterprise for details.

Individual end-users are very strongly encouraged to obtain Pengwin or Fedora Remix for WSL instead. Pengwin includes end-user support and several usability modifications and tools, such as pengwin-setup, to improve the overall WSL experience for end-users.

The Pengwin Enterprise build provided on the Microsoft Store does NOT include Red Hat Enterprise Linux packages, end-user support, pengwin-setup, or the WSL usability features that accompany Pengwin or are built into Pengwin Enterprise in a custom deployment.

Whitewater Foundry is a Microsoft Partner, Red Hat Business Partner, and licensee in the Open Innovation Network.

Pengwin Enterprise is not endorsed by or affiliated with the CentOS Project, Scientific Linux, Rocky Linux, or Fermi National Accelerator Laboratory.

DISCLAIMER: Windows Insider Preview versions are not production-ready and can contain incompatibilities or bugs that affect the performance of Pengwin. We support insider versions on a best-effort basis.

Similar to the incredibly useful sleep/suspend function found in consoles like the Nintendo Switch and Sony PlayStation; suspend your game (and its resource usage) at any time, and resume whenever you wish - at the push of a button.


## Suspend Games

- Pause cutscenes to read the subtitles, examine the scene, answer the door, etc.
- Pause games that can't normally be paused (single-player games like Dark Souls, Elden
  Ring, etc)
- Suspend games whose pause screens keep the system running hot or playing
  unwanted music
- Suspend inbetween checkpoints (example: Hollow Knight)


## Suspend Applications

Nyrna can be used to suspend normal, non-game applications as well. For example:

- 3D renders
- video encoding
- software compilation

The CPU and GPU resources are being used by said task - maybe for hours - when
you would like to use the system for something else. With Nyrna you can suspend
that program,
freeing up the resources (excluding RAM) until the process is resumed,
without losing where you were - like the middle of a long job, or a gaming session
between save points.

## OPTIMIZE OUTPUT IMAGES

Not only a NEF to JPG converter, but also optimize size and quality output images.

NEF to PNG converter supports optimization options:
• Support lossless compression options to make your output image size smaller, keep highest quality.

NEF to PNG8 supports optimization options:
• Support lossless compression options to make your output image size smaller, keep highest quality.
• Interlaced: support interlaced, non-interlaced PNG.
• Adjust number of colors in color palette.
• Support 2 dithering methods.

NEF to JPG/JPEG converter supports optimization options:
• Quality: adjust lossy compression quality, to make jpg output image file size smaller than PNG file size, better for storage and SEO purpose.
• Progressive: choose the way to encode and display image - JPEG progressive vs JPEG baseline.

NEF to GIF converter supports optimization options:
• Adjust number of colors in color palette.
• Support 2 dithering methods.

NEF to ICO converter supports optimization options:
• Multiple sizes icon: choose multiple image sizes to embed in 1 ICO.
• ICO size fit options: Contain, Cover, Fill.

NEF to WEBP converter supports optimization options:
• Number of methods: to use to compress image, software will choose the best of result, the more methods, the more chance to make output image size smaller, the more time consumed.
• Keep the image's background transparent or change them to opaque (choose a color to fill).
• Lossless WebP compression:
•• Lossless compression support near lossless compression method (experimental).
•• Choose image source type (default, photo, picture, graph), and the software will choose the best way to process your image.
• Lossy WebP compression:
•• Lossy compression quality: lower quality but smaller file size or vise versa.

## COMMON IMAGE OPTIMIZATION OPTIONS

• Support Brightness and White Balance settings to make display color correctly.
• Support option to remove potentially privacy-compromising metadata (EXIF, IPTC, XMP) from image and to keep the output file size smaller.
• Simple options "Make Default" for easier usage.
• Resize output images (keep aspect ratio and ignore aspect ratio).

## MULTIPLE NEF, NRW CONVERSION AT ONCE & SINGLE FILE PROCESS

• Or focusing on a single image.

Nom De L'application: Irix Pro HDR - AI Photo Editor
Description:
Irix HDR donne vie à l'édition photo HDR en offrant des modifications en un clic à un ensemble d'outils d'édition professionnels à grande échelle.

• Remplacement du ciel (SkyXpress) - Remplacez le ciel et introduisez la météo. Importez des ciels personnalisés et fusionnez, combinez, intégrez avec l'image pour un look natif à l'aide de AI Edge Detect

• Préréglages et filtres - Plus de 200 préréglages optimisés pour les médias sociaux en une seule touche pour une modification instantanée. Voir l'aperçu en direct du préréglage appliqué à votre photo, choisissez et cliquez pour terminer votre photo

• Amélioration automatique de l'IA - Effectuez des modifications de style professionnel automatique en une seule touche. Le moteur Irix HDR Voxell AI est formé sur plus de 12 millions d'images et applique des techniques photographiques recherchées pour améliorer vos photos

• Étalonnage des couleurs Pro : étalonnage des couleurs avec hautes lumières et ombres, réglage du contraste, de la balance des couleurs et des blancs, du niveau de noir, de la saturation et de la luminance sur l'ensemble de l'image ou de la zone sélectionnée

• Superpositions - Importez une superposition personnalisée et introduisez des effets tels que la lumière artificielle, les rayons divins, les reflets dans l'eau, l'effet Halo, les ondulations, le rétro, des arrière-plans incroyables.

• Ajustements locaux - Effectuez des modifications localisées avec des masques et un pinceau. Appliquez les masques Radial, Gradient, Brush, Luminance, Depth. Insérer des superpositions personnalisées dans la zone sélectionnée.

• Texte, Emojis et filigrane - Stylisez le texte, insérez le droit d'auteur, le filigrane ou la signature. Exprimez vos émotions avec les Emojis

• LUTs - Importez des LUTs aux formats .CUBE, .VF, .3DL. Créez vos propres LUT en tant que fichier .CUBE

• Édition de profondeur : appliquez des ajustements locaux et globaux à n'importe quelle couche de profondeur ou insérez une superposition

• Édition à 360 ° et panorama – Modifiez, affichez et exportez, idéal pour les aménagements paysagers

• Images 64 bits : traitez des images de 8 à 64 bits en toute fidélité à l'aide du processeur graphique (Nvidia, AMD, Intel) avec une précision de 64 bits

• Gammes de couleurs ICC prises en charge - XDR, HDR, P3, sRVB, Adobe RVB, CMJN, Niveaux de gris, PANTONE© et espaces colorimétriques LAB

• Collaborez en ligne - Partagez des catalogues d'images (IRX) avec des collègues pour prévisualiser votre travail dans n'importe quel navigateur Web. Ou remettez simplement le catalogue avec toutes les couches d'édition et l'édition peut être reprise là où vous l'avez laissée

• Prise en charge de l'appareil photo - Modifiez les photos RAW de Sony, Nikon, Kodak, Canon, Panasonic, Ricoh, Samsung, etc.

• Les moteurs Voxell-G Graphics et Voxell AI poussent l'espace colorimétrique à la limite de la perception de l'œil humain et exécutent XDR, HDR, HDR10, HDR10+ pour des images jusqu'à 64 bits

• Irix HDR "GPU Optimizer" permet au processeur et au processeur graphique de fonctionner en tandem pour des modifications nettes, sans perte et d'une fidélité totale

• Créer et vendre des préréglages/LUT pour Adobe Lightroom, Photoshop, Premier Pro, DaVinci Resolve, Final Cut Pro, Pixelmator et OBS

• Technologies Windows - Conçu pour les processeurs SQ1, SQ2, Intel et AMD utilisant l'apprentissage automatique et le moteur de rendu DirectX. Prise en charge des écrans OneDrive, Auto HDR et à taux de rafraîchissement élevé.

Caractéristiques de base
- Température de couleur, teinte, éclat, saturation
- Lumière - Exposition, luminosité, contraste, hautes lumières, ombres, blancs, noirs, diffus
- Recadrer, faire pivoter, retourner. Cultures prédéfinies pour FB, Twitter, Instagram, Pinterest
- Guérir et cloner

Fonctionnalités avancées
- Édition d'images RAW
- Perspective & Affine (Redresser), corrections de distorsion trapézoïdale
- Mesh Warping - Liquéfier et restaurer à main levée
- Outils AI - Clarté, Dehaze, Denoise, Sharpen, Blur (Defocus), Bokeh. Outils spéciaux pour l'édition de photos de nuit
- Correction optique lentille & chromatique
- Vignette, grain et pixélisation
- Outils de sculpture du visage et du corps - retouche de la peau, élimination des imperfections, looks photogéniques

Fonctionnalités professionnelles
- Détection et effacement des contours
- Le traitement par lots
- Couches et historique illimités
- Épreuvage écran - Mat & brillant
- Histogramme dynamique RVB et CMJN
- Courbes de tonalité HSL
- Accès complet à Exif et aux métadonnées
- Faites glisser et déposez des images jusqu'à 200 mégapixels, vue en direct dans la pellicule, panoramique, zoom
- Ouvrir plusieurs fenêtres indépendantes ou image de référence
- Formats d'image compressés : JPG, JPEG, PNG, BMP, GIF, GRIS
- Formats d'image brutes - TIFF, TIF, CRW, CR2, DNG, KDC, MOS, NEF, NRW, PTX, R3D, RAF, RAW, SR2, X3F, etc.
